items.sentence: Tom will attend today's meeting instead of me.
This isn't the same car I had three years ago.
Can you show me where Tom Jackson's office is?
Don't forget to go talk to Tom this afternoon.
If Tom wanted to kill me, I'd already be dead.
Tom wants you to get here as soon as possible.
Tom wants you to call him as soon as possible.
Tom was the last one to cross the finish line.
Tom has made up his mind to quit working here.
Tom wasn't tall enough to reach the top shelf.
